attacks.name: Roar
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
